response.overview: After news that their dear friend had passed away, the Primus Family decide to give up their busy life in New York to journey around the world with hopes of growing closer as a family, and proving the value of travel in raising children to be compassionate human beings who feel part of the greater global community.  After visiting Argentina, Colombia, Taipei, Vietnam, The Yukon and Lebanon the traveling family is halted by the global shut downs that resulted from the Covid-19 pandemic. The family decides to relocate to a small farming town where they recount the lessons and adventures of their journey - and how it changed their lives forever.
response.tagline: Follow the Primus family as they travel from the Mekong Delta and the Middle East, to South America, and the Arctic Circle.
response.title: Raising Global Citizens
